verses.verse: <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> shall you <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H6031>humble<s%> you, and to <S%H5254>prove<s%> you, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> was in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> whether you would <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> or <S%H3808>no.<s%>

And he <S%H6031>humbled<s%> you, and suffered you to <S%H7456>hunger,<s%> and <S%H398>fed<s%> you with <S%H4478>manna,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>knew<s%> not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> did your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>know;<s%> that he might make you <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> does not <S%H2421>live<s%> by <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> but by <S%H3605>every<s%> word that <S%H4161>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> does <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>
Your <S%H8071>raiment<s%> waxed not <S%H1086>old<s%> on you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> did your <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H1216>swell,<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

You shall also <S%H3045>consider<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that, as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3256>chastens<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3256>chastens<s%> you.
Therefore you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H3372>fear<s%> him.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> of <S%H5869>fountains<s%> and <S%H8415>depths<s%> that <S%H3318>spring<s%> out of <S%H1237>valleys<s%> and <S%H2022>hills;<s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H1612>vines,<s%> and <S%H8384>fig<s%> trees, and <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4544>scarceness,<s%> you shall not <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> thing in it; a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> are <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and out of whose <S%H2042>hills<s%> you may <S%H2672>dig<s%> <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

When you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and are <S%H7646>full,<s%> then you shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

<S%H8104>Beware<s%> that you <S%H7911>forget<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in not <S%H8104>keeping<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day:<s%>
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> when you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> and are <S%H7646>full,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein;

And when your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and your <S%H3701>silver<s%> and your <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have is <S%H7235>multiplied;<s%>

Then your <S%H3824>heart<s%> be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up, and you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H4161>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%>

Who <S%H3212>led<s%> you through that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> wherein were <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents,<s%> and <S%H6137>scorpions,<s%> and <S%H6774>drought,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H4161>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H2496>flint;<s%>

Who <S%H398>fed<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> with <S%H4478>manna,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not, that he might <S%H6031>humble<s%> you, and that he might <S%H5254>prove<s%> you, to do you <S%H3190>good<s%> at your <S%H319>latter<s%> end;
And you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> My <S%H3581>power<s%> and the <S%H6108>might<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H6213>gotten<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2428>wealth.<s%>

But you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> for it is he that <S%H5414>gives<s%> you <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H6213>get<s%> <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> that he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> you do at all <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, I <S%H5749>testify<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day<s%> that you shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish.<s%>

As the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6>destroys<s%> before your face, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you <S%H6>perish;<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> you would not be <S%H8085>obedient<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
